text: Va agar ononro hangome ki dar pesgohi Parvardigorason nigoh dosta mesavand, ʙuʙini, [sigiftzada mesavi. Alloh taolo ʙa onon] megujad: «Ojo in [zindagii pas az marg] haq nest?» Onon megujand: «Bale, qasam ʙa Parvardigoramon [ki haq ast]. [Alloh taolo] megujad: «Pas, ʙa sazoi on ki kufr mevarzided, in azoʙro ʙicased»
